passage_text: 1 According to Vonlotta.com, a breeder online that raises and sells German Shepherds, the cost for this particular breed can range anywhere from $1,500 to $3,500 depending on their origin as well as other various factors. The average Shepherd can weigh up to 100 pounds and can grow up to 26 inches tall. The cost of a German Shepherd is going to greatly depend upon the breeder, the location, as well as other various factors. 1  On average, a puppy can cost anywhere from $350 to as much as $3,500 for an AKC bred puppy. 2  Most purchases are going to fall within the $350 to $800 price tag range

Compared to puppies from pet shops, high pedigree champions from a superior breed tend to cost more. Adult German Shepherd. The dollar amount of German shepherds oscillates between $750 and $1,200. This price normally changes to a slightly higher amount if the purchase is being made from a well known breeder. However you need to be very careful because even the reputed breeder may not be selling the best puppies around. Here you can get one from $100 to $350. Grooming Cost. Whenever you are looking at the cost of a German shepherd, you also need to look at the grooming cost. It helps in keeping the dogs healthier and free from diseases.

How much is a dog from Germany. If you want to know that how much is the shepherd from Germany, then the answer is that it may cost you around $3000-$5000. Again it depends upon the fact that from whom you are buying and how much that German shepherd is trained. Mow much is a German shepherd husky mix worth. If you want to know that how much is a German shepherd husky mix worth, then the answer is that it may cost you around $200. Still there are many such dogs, which cost more and less.

by admin · June 12, 2013. At 8 weeks old, German Shepherd puppies usually range from $600 to $5,000, depending on their bloodline, breed type, show potential, pedigree, etc. Older puppies with additional training from responsible breeders often cost more. 7 or 8 week old puppies start off around $2,500 and work their way up to $4,500 depending on the pedigree and titles and awards held. Adults with Schtuzhund training and hip certifications or other titles can easily run into the $10,000 range.

Report Abuse. As a long time GSD breeder who exhibits my dogs, I charge $600.00-$750.00 pet/companion. Show/competition/breeding prospects are $1000.00-$2000.00. and must be ofa'd hip and elbows BEFORE they can be used in any breeding program. I also encourage my dog buyers to check for thyroid, pancreas, cardio function.

If you plan on purchasing a German Shepherd Dog from a breeder you should expect the price range to be from 200 - 500 pounds... I presume you mean buy. Well if you got one fr … om the shelter it would only cost 100-300 pounds and breeders only generally sell puppies. A GSD trained to guide the blind, for example, is worth over $30,000.   Other contributors have added:   It can vary from 400-600 euro. when i got my German Shepard he cost 400.

A Pure breed AKC German Shephed from a Pro Breeder that Shows, and the puppy is Show Quality will cost you around $2500. They come with Guarantees and These breeders stand by there dogs and give Lifetime Support ! Some Show breeders do NOT OFA there stock. The range varies from say, $50-$2000. Frankly I want a breeder who knows what the hell they are doing and know their genetics. If I was just interested in not showing, I would go to the shelter and save one there, because you can find alot of purebreds there. Also go thru German Shepherd rescue.
